viralPosts.author: byrneout44.bsky.social

viralPosts.text: #disabilityjustice  Our disabled comrades need your helping hands!
viralPosts.author: alsvid.bsky.social

viralPosts.text: Disability justice is economic justice. In 2023, 24.2% of disabled adults 18‚Äì64 lived in poverty vs 9.9% of nondisabled peers. That gap isn‚Äôt grit; it‚Äôs policy, access, bias. Enforce ADA, end subminimum wage, raise SSI asset limits, and fund real access. #DisabilityJustice #TruthBombTuesday
viralPosts.author: mrskgrady.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Many seem to think #disabled people "should just work", but they don't understand/care that:

1. Workplaces systemically discriminate against us 

2. We're often paid less than the non-disabled

3. Accommodations that would enable us to work are often denied

and it makes me mad.
#DisabilityJustice
viralPosts.author: ellatholmes.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
You know what's *really* sexy?

Creating alt text for visual media you post üòò 

#tip #lifetip #giveitup #alttext #accessibility #communityservice
viralPosts.author: mmmtho.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Just like web performance work, accessibility winds up being less expensive the earlier you implement it. Build accessibility in from the start, rather than bolting it on - make it part of the process.

@marcysutton.com #webperf #PerfNow #a11y

viralPosts.author: ellatholmes.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
They personally don't need them "yet".

They're basically advocating against their older selves' needs.

Slower reaction times, lower vision, arthritis, shorter memory, smaller attention span, you name it.

They'll come around one day and thank us when they can still play.

#a11y #GamesAccessibility
